https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/cPGzSSbBT6ckvHmLkcNsn4J9MkJ.jpg The murder of a restaurant owner who is gunned down in front of a diner full of customers has unexpected repercussions for Alex, whose brother, Paul, represented two men expected of involvement in the killing. Meanwhile, Steinar, amidst tension with Alex and the breakdown of his marriage, accepts the offer of a transfer from Klas. Beck 38 - The Devil's Advocate
